    • Method Detail

      • getRentedMovies

        public java.util.List<RentedMovie> getRentedMovies()
                                            throws CommonException
        This method returns all movies that were rented.
        Returns:
        list of rented movies in ascending order(ordered by user ID).
        Throws:
        CommonException - if Rented Movie list is empty (rentedmovie table is empty)

      • getRentedMoviesByUserId

        public java.util.List<RentedMovie> getRentedMoviesByUserId​(java.lang.Long userId)
                                                    throws CommonException
        This method returns movies that are rented by a specified user.
        Parameters:
        userId - is a user ID (required).
        Returns:
        List of movies that a specified user has rented.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if user with given ID is not present in the database
        CommonException - if user with given ID does not have any rented movies.

      • getRentedMoviesByMovieId

        public java.util.List<RentedMovie> getRentedMoviesByMovieId​(java.lang.Long movieId)
                                                     throws CommonException
        This method returns rented movies by movie ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - is a movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        list of rented movies by movie ID.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given ID does not exist.
        CommonException - if movie with given ID was not rented by anybody.

      • calculate

        public Invoice calculate​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> movieIds,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> timesInWeeks)
                  throws CommonException
        This method returns a calculated invoice with the price per movie rental and the total amount to pay.
        Parameters:
        movieIds - List of movie IDs (required).
        timesInWeeks - List of weeks that movies are rented (amount of weeks per each movie) (required).
        Returns:
        a calculated invoice with the price per movie rental and the total amount to pay.
        Throws:
        CommonException - if movie with given ID does not exist.
        CommonException - if there are duplicate movie IDs in the request.
        CommonException - if amount of renting weeks per each movie is not present in the request.

      • rentMovie

        public void rentMovie​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> movieIDs,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> timesInWeeks,
                      java.lang.Long userId)
               throws CommonException
        This method adds movies that a specified user has rented.
        Parameters:
        movieIDs - List of movie IDs (required).
        timesInWeeks - List of weeks that movies are rented (amount of weeks per each movie) (required).
        userId - ID of a user that rents movies (required).
        Throws:
        CommonException - if there are duplicate movie IDs in the request.
        CommonException - if amount of renting weeks per each movie is not present in the request.
        CommonException - if User with specified ID already owns one of the movies requested movies.

      • getPopularMovies

        public java.util.List<Statistics> getPopularMovies()
        This method returns movies in descending order (from popular to unpopular).
        Returns:
        returns movies in descending order (from the biggest amount of purchases to the smallest amount).
